channel.title: Server logging in issue?
channel.description: I am creating a server with my friend. I am hosting and we both are coding. But besides that, we are on a community that supports the webclients w/ loaders. I am on a InsanityX base source and when I try to log in it says Error connecting to server but he can get on and so can many other people? Anyone know why this issue is occurring?

item.title: Server logging in issue?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Make your client that you connect with 127.0.0.1, assuming that you are the creator.

Read full topic

item.title: Server logging in issue?
item.dc:creator: @michael_5593 michael 5593
item.description:
@michael_5593 wrote:

OK is it a web client or are one of you hosting the server on your computer your using?

Read full topic
